querystring.select: SELECT ACPFD.MONTHLY_INCOME_AMT AS MonthlyIncomeAmt, ACPFD.MONTHLY_EXPENSE_AMT AS MonthlyExpenseAmt, RMIT.DESCR AS SourceOfIncomeName, ACPFD.MONTHLY_INSTALLMENT_AMT AS MonthlyInstallmentAmt, ACPFD.SPOUSE_MONTHLY_INCOME_AMT AS SpouseMonthlyIncomeAmt, ACPFD.IS_JOIN_INCOME AS IsJoinIncome, ACPFD.MONTHLY_INCOME_AMT + ACPFD.SPOUSE_MONTHLY_INCOME_AMT AS TotalMonthlyIncomeAmt, ACPFD.MONTHLY_EXPENSE_AMT + ACPFD.MONTHLY_INSTALLMENT_AMT AS TotalMonthlyExpenseAmt, (ACPFD.MONTHLY_INCOME_AMT + ACPFD.SPOUSE_MONTHLY_INCOME_AMT) - (ACPFD.MONTHLY_EXPENSE_AMT + ACPFD.MONTHLY_INSTALLMENT_AMT) AS NettMonthlyIncomeAmt
querystring.from: FROM dbo.APP_CUST AC WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.APP_CUST_PERSONAL ACP WITH(NOLOCK) ON AC.APP_CUST_ID = ACP.APP_CUST_ID LEFT JOIN dbo.APP_CUST_PERSONAL_FIN_DATA ACPFD WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACP.APP_CUST_PERSONAL_ID = ACPFD.APP_CUST_PERSONAL_ID LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER RMIT WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACPFD.MR_SOURCE_OF_INCOME_TYPE_CODE = RMIT.MASTER_CODE AND RMIT.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'SOURCE_OF_INCOME'
